title: Rainbow at Dusk
description: You smiled through your tears in Jess Ramsay's thoroughbred world. You held your head high even though your heart was breaking. So, Although Major Vance Trent had gone to another girl's arms, Jess carried on as proudly as before. There was the Red Cross, and Aunt Ellen's plantation to help run - and above all the perils of subversive infiltrators. With the recklessness of despairing love, Jess threw herself into the hunt for traitors - only to find, at her blackest hour, the courageous figure of Vance Trent by her side.....
author: Emilie Loring
